answer: China showcases flagship solar projects like the 500 MW/2,000 MWh battery energy storage system in Tongliao, Inner Mongolia; the 3,000 MW (3 GW) Nilka County PV Park in Xinjiang; and the 1km-wide space solar array, with details on scale and location provided.
ground_truth: 100GW Great Solar Wall in Inner Mongolia; 4GW Ruoqiang Solar Project; 1GW open-sea solar plant in Shandong
